short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds new features to the (already amazing) ToN tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a bunch of useful features for all the stats lovers :
- Can display a history of the previous rounds (use along live tracking)
- Shows your total progress in numbers and percentages (ignores legacy terrors and those such as glorbo)
- Hold shift to have an overview of what round type you've survived a terror on.
- A tiny little cross button but very powerful.
- A "mastered" state to any terror that has been survived under any possible round. 
- A "round progress" page, this displays what percentage of terrors you've survived under each round, under the form of progress bars.
- A few additional counters for survived/mastered terrors.
- A variety of seach bars.
- A few customization settings
- ADDED THE POSSIBILITY TO IMPORT DATA FROM THE SAVE MANAGER YEAAAAAAA-

THIS IS AN EARLY BUILD. Many things don't look good, some may not function very efficiently. Don't worry about your data though since this extension only reads it and never write on it.

Some features from this extension may make it into the tracker itself eventually (and would look a hundred times cooler for sure).

1.5.4 changelog :
- Fixed mastered terrors not initiating properly.
